explanation: The program printed D/C (the reciprocal) instead of C/D when computing the probability for the random selection case. I fixed the single incorrect line by printing C/D so the probability is computed as (number chosen) / (number of eligible participants). This directly addresses the bug; no related diff was needed for this simple arithmetic fix.
fixed_code:
inp=input().split()
A=inp[0]
A=int(A)
B=inp[1]
B=int(B)
C=inp[2]
C=int(C)
X=inp[3]
X=int(X)
D=B-A
if A>=X:
    print(1)
elif B<X:
    print(0)
else:    
    print(C/D)
